titleStmt.title: Meditations and disquisitions upon the one and fiftieth Psalme of Dauid Miserere mei Deus. By Sr. Richard Baker, Knight.
titleStmt.author: Baker, Richard, Sir, 1568-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin, for Anne Bouler, and are to be sold at the Marigold, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
